name: SaharaDAO
description: Sahara DAO is a synthetics protocol delivering innovative synth markets to the Cronos Network. Sahara DAO's first fractional-algorithmic synthetic token (MMFX) is pegged to the value of 1 MMF on Cronos Chain. Sahara DAO will be delivering further synth markets for the most popular Cronos tokens. The platform introduces a partial collateralized design where the protocol’s synths are backed by the underlying asset as well as Sahara’s native token.
